content.html: Plenty old post at willnorris.com/2014/07/webfin… but it just helped me setup my #nginx, so my #Fediverse account can now be found by searching for my mail address. And if I ever decide to move it's just editing one file, and the search finds the right place. Cute.
content.text:
Plenty old post at willnorris.com/2014/07/webfin… but it just helped me setup my #nginx, so my #Fediverse account can now be found by searching for my mail address.
And if I ever decide to move it's just editing one file, and the search finds the right place.

Cute.
